body.title: Senior Software Engineer

details: Pioneered a cutting-edge print-on-demand and dropshipping platform designed to empower online merchants with a comprehensive solution for creating and selling personalized products.
Led the development of Kingify, a versatile platform that seamlessly integrates with popular marketplaces like Viermart, Shopify, WooCommerce, and Etsy, offering merchants a unified experience.

Demonstrated expertise in full-stack development utilizing Node.js, VueJS, Redis, and Docker to deliver a scalable and reliable platform.

body.title: Software Development Team Lead

details: Successfully architected and implemented a cutting-edge microservices-based Booking API system for airlines and travel agencies, encompassing flights, hotels, tours, transfers, and car services.
Unified disparate models into a cohesive framework, ensuring seamless integration and scalability.
Adhered to industry best practices to deliver a robust, reliable, and highly available system capable of handling peak demand.
Streamlined operations by building a new hotel mapping system using Neo4j, resolving legacy issues and improving data accuracy.
Empowered management teams with a user-friendly ReactJS-based admin dashboard for efficient booking management and configuration.
Enhanced customer experiences by developing a modern, responsive client site using VueJS.
Modernized development processes by establishing Kubernetes infrastructure and implementing standardized CI/CD pipelines using Helm charts for streamlined deployment.
Significantly reduced operational costs by leveraging AWS spot instances and GCP pre-emptible VMs, achieving cost savings of 60-80%.
Cultivated a high-performing team through mentorship, code reviews, and knowledge sharing.
Expanded team capacity by successfully recruiting and onboarding new talent.
